name: Paths
description: The path around islands and peninsulas described by sailing directions on the Mao Kun map

properties.name: Nanjing to Taicang
properties.translation: [No guidance, since pilots can follow the banks of the river]

properties.name: Taicang, Jiangsu to Nanhuizui, Shanghai
properties.text: 《太倉港口》開船，用丹乙針，一更船平《吳淞江》。 用乙卯針，一更船到《南匯嘴》。
properties.translation: Starting from Taicang Harbor (太倉港口), sail on a course of 105° (乙, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Huangpu River (吳淞江). Sail on a course of 97.5° (乙卯, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Nanhuizui (南匯嘴).
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Taicangjiang [Liuhe], and steers exactly 105 degrees; after 1 watch the ship is level with Wusongjiang [Wusong bar]. Steer 105 degrees-90 degrees; after 1 watch, the ship reaches Nanhuicui.
properties.textHtml:
• 《太倉港口》開船，用丹乙針，一更船平《吳淞江》。
  • 用乙卯針，一更船到《南匯嘴》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Starting from Taicang Harbor (太倉港口), sail on a course of 105° (乙, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Huangpu River (吳淞江).
  • Sail on a course of 97.5° (乙卯, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Nanhuizui (南匯嘴).

properties.name: Zhaobao, Shanghai to Jiushan Archipelago, Zhejiang
properties.text: 平《招寶》，用乙辰針，三更船出洪。 打水丈六七正路。 見《茶山》在東北。 邊過，用巽巳針，四更船見《大小七山》。 打水六七托。 用坤申及丁未針，三更船取《霍山》。 用丹午針，三更船取《(東)霍山》。 用丹午針，六(更船取)《西後門》。 用巽巳針，三更船取《大磨山》。 用乙辰針，一更船取《小磨山》轄《崎頭》《昇羅嶼》。 用丁未針，一更船出《雙嶼港》。 用丙午針，一更船取《孝順洋》。 一路，打水九托九平。 《九山》對《九山》西南邊，有一沆礁打浪。 有一沆礁打浪出水打船仔細。
properties.translation: When level with Zhaobao (招寶), sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to exit the main current. The 5 fathom (6-7 托) contour is the correct course to the mouth of the river. You will sight Sheshan Island (茶山) on the northeast side. After passing it, sail on a course of 142.5º (巽巳, SSE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until you see Gutzlaff Island (大小七山). Keep your soundings in 5 fathoms (6-7 托). Sail on a course of 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 7.2 hours to (3 更)  reach Tanhu Island (灘山 mislabeled as 霍山). Sail on a course of 180º (午, due south) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Donghuo Island (霍山). Sail on a course of 180º (午, due south) for 14.4 hours (6 更) to reach Xihoumen (西後門). Sail on a course of 142.5° (巽巳, SSE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Damao Island (大磨山). Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Xiaomoshan (小磨山), round the Qitou Ocean (崎頭), and reach Shengluo Yuanshan (昇羅嶼). Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to exit Shuangyu Port (雙嶼港). Sail on a course of 172.5º (丙午, SSE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) through Xiaoshan Ocean (孝順洋). Follow the 7 fathom (9-9.5 托) contour all the way. There is a reef making waves extending from Jiushan toward the southwest. Sail carefully as you exit.
properties.millsTranslation: When level with Zhaobao (near Gaoqiao), steer 105-120 degrees. After 3 watches the ship goes out into the main. Take a sounding 6 or 7 zhang; that is the correct course. You sight Chashan on the northeast side; After passing it steer 135-150 degrees; after 4 watches the ship sights Da (Daqishan, 30o 48' N) and Xiao qishan (Hen and Chicks). Take a sounding, 6 or 7 fathoms. Steer 225-240 degrees, then 195-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Tanshan (Tanhushan). Steer exactly 180 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Heshan (Dongheshan, 30o 15' N). Steering exactly 180 degrees, the ship enters Xihoumen (Blackwall pass). Steer 135-150 degrees; after 3 watches the ship makes Damoshan (Damaoshan, 29o 56' N). Steer 105-120 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Xiaomoshan (Xiaomaoshan), rounds Qitou 29o 53' N), and makes Shenglexu (Xingleshan). Steer 195-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship goes out through Shangxu jiang (Duffield pass). Steer 165-180 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Xiaoshunyang (northern portion of Niubishan channel). Take soundings all along the route. The depth is 9 fathoms when you are level with Jiushan (Kueshan) islands. Opposite to Jiushan on the southwest side there is one sunken rock which shows above the water when the waves break on it (Heijiao, Holderness rocks). Navigate the ship carefully in all directions.
properties.textHtml:
• 平《招寶》，用乙辰針，三更船出洪。
  • 打水丈六七正路。
  • 見《茶山》在東北。
  • 邊過，用巽巳針，四更船見《大小七山》。
  • 打水六七托。
  • 用坤申及丁未針，三更船取《霍山》。
  • 用丹午針，三更船取《(東)霍山》。
  • 用丹午針，六(更船取)《西後門》。
  • 用巽巳針，三更船取《大磨山》。
  • 用乙辰針，一更船取《小磨山》轄《崎頭》《昇羅嶼》。
  • 用丁未針，一更船出《雙嶼港》。
  • 用丙午針，一更船取《孝順洋》。
  • 一路，打水九托九平。
  • 《九山》對《九山》西南邊，有一沆礁打浪。
  • 有一沆礁打浪出水打船仔細。
properties.translationHtml:
• When level with Zhaobao (招寶), sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to exit the main current.
  • The 5 fathom (6-7 托) contour is the correct course to the mouth of the river.
  • You will sight Sheshan Island (茶山) on the northeast side.
  • After passing it, sail on a course of 142.5º (巽巳, SSE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until you see Gutzlaff Island (大小七山).
  • Keep your soundings in 5 fathoms (6-7 托).
  • Sail on a course of 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 7.2 hours to (3 更) reach Tanhu Island (灘山 mislabeled as 霍山).
  • Sail on a course of 180º (午, due south) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Donghuo Island (霍山).
  • Sail on a course of 180º (午, due south) for 14.4 hours (6 更) to reach Xihoumen (西後門).
  • Sail on a course of 142.5° (巽巳, SSE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Damao Island (大磨山).
  • Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Xiaomoshan (小磨山), round the Qitou Ocean (崎頭), and reach Shengluo Yuanshan (昇羅嶼).
  • Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to exit Shuangyu Port (雙嶼港).
  • Sail on a course of 172.5º (丙午, SSE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) through Xiaoshan Ocean (孝順洋).
  • Follow the 7 fathom (9-9.5 托) contour all the way.
  • There is a reef making waves extending from Jiushan toward the southwest.
  • Sail carefully as you exit.

properties.name: Jiushan Archipelago, Zhejiang to Dongtou Island
properties.text: (用)甲辛午針，二更船平《檀頭山》。 東邊有《江片礁》，西邊見《大佛頭山》。 平《東西崎山》，用丁午針，五更船平《羊琪》及《大陳》《三母》。 黄礁前見《直谷山》。 用丁未針，二更船平《石塘山》。 用丁未針，三更船平《狹山》外渦。 用坤未針，二更船取《黄(礁)山》。 打水十七八托平《中界山》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 277.5º (酉辛 mislabeled as 甲辛?) for 4.8 hours (2 更), until even with Tantoushan Island (檀頭山). Jiangpian Reef is on the east side. Look for Hua'ao Island (大佛頭山) on the west side. Even with the Dongji Archipelago (東西崎山), sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 12 hours (5 更) to be even with Yangqi Island (羊琪), Xiadachen Island (大陳), and Shangdachen Island (三母). In front of Yellow Reef, look for Jigu Island (直谷山). Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to be even with Shitangzhen (石塘山). Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to be to pass outside Pishan Island (狹山). Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Huangjiaodao (黄山). Follow the 13 fathom (17-18 托) contour when passing Dongtou Island (中界山).
properties.millsTranslation: After 2 watches the ship is level with Tantou shan (29º 10' N). On the east side is Jiangbianjiao; on the west side you see Dafoshan (Dafutou). When you are level with Dongxi qi shan (Dong Jishan and Gaodao), steer 195-180 degrees. After 5 watches the ship is level with Yangqi (Pingfeng shan) and Dachen (Xia Da chen shan) and San mu (Shang Da chen shan, 28º 30' N), and Huangjiao (Shangxu). In front you see Zhigushan; steer 195-210 degrees; after 2 watches the ship is level with Shitang shan (Niushan). Steer 195-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship is level with Xiashan (Pishan, 28º 05' N) and passes it on the outside. Steer 225-210 degrees. After 2 watches the ship is level with Huangshan (Banmianshan?). Take a sounding, 17-18 fathoms. The ship is level with Zhongjieshan (Beiceshan?)
properties.textHtml:
• (用)甲辛午針，二更船平《檀頭山》。
  • 東邊有《江片礁》，西邊見《大佛頭山》。
  • 平《東西崎山》，用丁午針，五更船平《羊琪》及《大陳》《三母》。
  • 黄礁前見《直谷山》。
  • 用丁未針，二更船平《石塘山》。
  • 用丁未針，三更船平《狹山》外渦。
  • 用坤未針，二更船取《黄(礁)山》。
  • 打水十七八托平《中界山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sail on a course of 277.5º (酉辛 mislabeled as 甲辛?) for 4.8 hours (2 更), until even with Tantoushan Island (檀頭山).
  • Jiangpian Reef is on the east side. Look for Hua'ao Island (大佛頭山) on the west side.
  • Even with the Dongji Archipelago (東西崎山), sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 12 hours (5 更) to be even with Yangqi Island (羊琪), Xiadachen Island (大陳), and Shangdachen Island (三母).
  • In front of Yellow Reef, look for Jigu Island (直谷山).
  • Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to be even with Shitangzhen (石塘山).
  • Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to be to pass outside Pishan Island (狹山).
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Huangjiaodao (黄山).
  • Follow the 13 fathom (17-18 托) contour when passing Dongtou Island (中界山).

properties.name: Dongtou Island, Zhejiang to Fuying Island, Fujian
properties.text: 用坤未針一更船取《東洛山》。 用坤未針一更船取《南己山》外渦船。 用丹坤及坤未針三更船取《臺山》。 打水二十托。 用坤未針三更船取《東乗西乗山》。 用坤未針二更船取《芙蓉山》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Beiji Island (東洛山). Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass outside Nanji Island (南己山). Sail on a course of 225º (坤, SW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Taishan Island. (臺山) Follow the 14 fathom (20 托) contour through the channel. Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Nanshuang (東乗) and Beishuang (西乗) Islands. Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Fuying Island (芙蓉山).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 225-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Dongleshan (Beijishan).  Steer 225-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Nanjishan (27º 28' N), and the ship passes outside it. Steer exactly 225 degrees, then 225-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Taishan (26º 59' N), take a sounding, 20 fathoms. Steer 225-210 degrees, after 3 watches the ship makes Dongqi (Nanshuangdao) and Xiqishan (Beishuangdao).  Steer 225-210 degrees; after 2 watches the ship makes Furongshan (Fuyingshan), and passes outside it.
properties.textHtml:
• 用坤未針一更船取《東洛山》。
  • 用坤未針一更船取《南己山》外渦船。
  • 用丹坤及坤未針三更船取《臺山》。
  • 打水二十托。
  • 用坤未針三更船取《東乗西乗山》。
  • 用坤未針二更船取《芙蓉山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Beiji Island (東洛山).
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass outside Nanji Island (南己山).
  • Sail on a course of 225º (坤, SW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Taishan Island. (臺山)
  • Follow the 14 fathom (20 托) contour through the channel.
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Nanshuang (東乗) and Beishuang (西乗) Islands.
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Fuying Island (芙蓉山).

properties.name: Xiyang Island, Fujian to Beijiao
properties.text: 外渦平《洪山》，用坤申針及丹坤針，二更船取《北交》。
properties.translation: Passing outside Xiyang Island (洪山), follow the course 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 225º (坤, SW) and sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Beijiao (北交).
properties.millsTranslation: When level with Hongshan (Zhizhudao), steer 225-240 degrees and then exactly 225 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Beijiao (Beiling sijiao, 26º 22' N)
properties.textHtml: • 外渦平《洪山》，用坤申針及丹坤針，二更船取《北交》。
properties.translationHtml: • Passing outside Xiyang Island (洪山), follow the course 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 225º (坤, SW) and sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Beijiao (北交).

properties.name: Beiji Island, Zhejiang to Huangwan Island, Fujian
properties.text: 《東洛山門》內過，用庚申及坤申針，一更船平《鳳凰山》過《南己山》。 打水十三托。 用坤未針，三更船取《臺山》內過。 用坤未針，三更船取《東乗》內過。 船取坤未針，二更船取《芙蓉山》內過。 用丁未針，一更船過《小西洋山》。
properties.translation: Passing inside of Beiji Island (東洛山), sail on a course of 247.5º (庚申, WSW) and 232.5º (坤申, WSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Phoenix Island (鳳凰山) and Nanji Island (南己山). Follow the 22 fathom (30 托) contour through the channel. Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass insideTaishan Island (臺山). Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass inside Nanshuang Island (東乗). Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to pass inside Fuying Island (芙蓉山). Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Huangwan Island (小西洋山).
properties.millsTranslation: Passing within Dongleshan men (the passage westward of Beijishan), steer 255-240 degrees, and then 225-240 degrees. After 1 watch the ship is level with Fenghuangshan (27º 41' N). On passing Nanjishan (27º 28' N) take a sounding 13 fathoms. Steer 225-210 degrees; after 3 watches the ship makes Taishan (26º 59' N) and passes inside it. Steer 225-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Dongqi (Nanshuangdao), and passes inside it. The ship steers 225-210 degrees, and after 2 watches the ship makes Furongshan (Fuyingshan) and passes inside it. Steer 195-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship passes Xiao xi yang shan (Isimasidao).
properties.textHtml:
• 《東洛山門》內過，用庚申及坤申針，一更船平《鳳凰山》過《南己山》。
  • 打水十三托。
  • 用坤未針，三更船取《臺山》內過。
  • 用坤未針，三更船取《東乗》內過。
  • 船取坤未針，二更船取《芙蓉山》內過。
  • 用丁未針，一更船過《小西洋山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Passing inside of Beiji Island (東洛山), sail on a course of 247.5º (庚申, WSW) and 232.5º (坤申, WSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Phoenix Island (鳳凰山) and Nanji Island (南己山).
  • Follow the 22 fathom (30 托) contour through the channel.
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass insideTaishan Island (臺山).
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass inside Nanshuang Island (東乗).
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to pass inside Fuying Island (芙蓉山).
  • Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Huangwan Island (小西洋山).

properties.name: Huangwan Island, Fujian to Dongchong Peninsula
properties.text: 用丁午針，一更船取《北交頭門》。 內過沿山，取《定海》所前過。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Beijiao Channel (北交頭門). Go in, along the island to pass in front of Dinghai (定海).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 195-180 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Beijiaotou men (the passage between Beilingisjiao and Beixu (is), 26º 22' N). Pass within it. Follow the mountains, make Dinghaisuo (Dinghaitown) and pass in front of it.
properties.textHtml:
• 用丁午針，一更船取《北交頭門》。
  • 內過沿山，取《定海》所前過。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Beijiao Channel (北交頭門).
  • Go in, along the island to pass in front of Dinghai (定海).

properties.name: Around Wuhu Reef, Fujian
properties.text: 用丁午針，二更船取《五虎山》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Wuhushan ().
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 195-180 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Wuhushan (Huangqishan, 26º 05' N).
properties.textHtml: • 用丁午針，二更船取《五虎山》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Wuhushan ().

properties.name: Wuhu Reef, Fujian to Niushan
properties.text: 用乙辰針，平《官塘》二礁外渦。 用丙巳針，取《東沙》。 《東沙》用丹巳針，三更船平《牛山》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) to pass ouside the Guantang () second reef. Sail on a course of 157.5º (丙巳, SSE) to reach Dongsha ().
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 105-120 degrees; come level with the two rocks called Guantang (Jixingjiao, 26º 05' N), and pass outside them. Steer 165-150, make Dongsha (Xichuandao). From Dongsha steer exactly 150 degrees; after 3 watches the ship is level with Niushan (25º 25' N).
properties.textHtml:
• 用乙辰針，平《官塘》二礁外渦。
  • 用丙巳針，取《東沙》。
  • 《東沙》用丹巳針，三更船平《牛山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) to pass ouside the Guantang () second reef.
  • Sail on a course of 157.5º (丙巳, SSE) to reach Dongsha ().

properties.name: Samudera Pasai to Berkey
properties.text: 《蘇門答剌》開船， 用丑艮及乙艮針，五更船平《急水湾》。 《巴碌頭》有淺。 用艮巽針，五更船取《甘杯港》。 用艮巽針，十五更船平《亞路》。 用乙艮針，五更船取《單嶼》。 再用艮巽針，四更船取《雙嶼》。 用丹巽及辰巽針，十五更船取《雞骨嶼》。
properties.translation: Sailing from the opening of Samudera Pasai (), Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) and 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to even with Meunasah Asan (). East Aceh () has shallows. Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Kuala Langsa (). Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 36 hours (15 更) to even with Medan (). Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Berhala (). Then, sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) to reach Shuangyu (). Sail on a course of 135º (巽, SE) and 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Pulau Berkey ().
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Sumendala [Kuala Pasai, 97 13' E]; steer 30-45 and [then] 105-120; after 5 watches the ship is level with Jishuiwan [Udjung Djambuaje, 5 15' N] [and then] Balu tou [Udjung Peureula, 4 54' N]; there are shoals.  Steer 120-135; after 5 watches the ship makes Ganbeijiang [Kumpai roadstead, 4 11' N]. Steer 120-135; after 15 watches the ship is level with Yalu [Deli River, 3 47' N]. Steer 105-120; [f. 16v] after 5 watches the ship makes Danxu [Berhala island, 3 46' N]. [f. 17] Again steer 120-135; after 4 watches the ship makes Shuangxu [the Brothers, ca 3 23' N]. Steer exactly 135 and [then] 120 [f. 16v]-135; after 15 watches the ship makes Jiguxu [Aruah islands, 2 53' N].
properties.textHtml:
• 《蘇門答剌》開船，
  • 用丑艮及乙艮針，五更船平《急水湾》。
  • 《巴碌頭》有淺。
  • 用艮巽針，五更船取《甘杯港》。
  • 用艮巽針，十五更船平《亞路》。
  • 用乙艮針，五更船取《單嶼》。
  • 再用艮巽針，四更船取《雙嶼》。
  • 用丹巽及辰巽針，十五更船取《雞骨嶼》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sailing from the opening of Samudera Pasai (),
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) and 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to even with Meunasah Asan ().
  • East Aceh () has shallows.
  • Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Kuala Langsa ().
  • Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 36 hours (15 更) to even with Medan ().
  • Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Berhala ().
  • Then, sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) to reach Shuangyu ().
  • Sail on a course of 135º (巽, SE) and 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Pulau Berkey ().

properties.name: Berkey to Malacca
properties.text: 取《雞骨嶼》，用丹辰及辰乙針，三更船平《綿花淺》。 用乙辰及丹辰針，三更船平《綿花(嶼)》。 用辰巽針，十更船平《滿剌加》。
properties.translation: Reaching Pulau Berkey, sail on a course of 120º (辰, ESE) and 112.5º (辰乙, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to even with Mianhua Shallows (). Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙艮, ESE) and 120º (辰, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to even with Mianhua Shallows (). Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to even with Malacca ().
properties.millsTranslation: After making Jiguxu, steer exactly 120 and [then] 120-105; after 3 watches the ship is level with Mianhua qian [Amazon Maru shoal, 2 51' N]. Steer 105-120 and [then] exactly 120; [f. 16] after 3 watches [f. 16v] the ship is level with Mianhua qian [read Mianhua xu, 'Cotton island', Bukit Jugra, 2 51' N]. Steer 120-135; [f. 16] after 10 watches the ship is level with Manlajia [Malacca, 2 12' N].
properties.textHtml:
• 取《雞骨嶼》，用丹辰及辰乙針，三更船平《綿花淺》。
  • 用乙辰及丹辰針，三更船平《綿花(嶼)》。
  • 用辰巽針，十更船平《滿剌加》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Reaching Pulau Berkey, sail on a course of 120º (辰, ESE) and 112.5º (辰乙, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to even with Mianhua Shallows ().
  • Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙艮, ESE) and 120º (辰, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to even with Mianhua Shallows ().
  • Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to even with Malacca ().

properties.name: Malacca to Great Karimun
properties.text: 《滿剌加》開船，用辰巽針，五更船平《射箭山》。 用辰巽針，三更船平《毘宋嶼》。 用丹巽針，取《吉利》。
properties.translation: From the entrance to Malacca, sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to be even with Mount Banang (). Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to be even with Banana Island (). Sail on a course of 135º (巽, SE) to reach Great Karimun ().
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Manlajia; steer 120-135; after 5 watches the ship is level with Shejianshan [Bukit Banang, 1 48' N]. Steer 120-135; after 3 watches the ship is level with Pisongxu [Pulau Pisang, 1 28' N]. Steer exactly 135, and make Jili [read Jilimen, Little Karimun island, 1 08' N].
properties.textHtml:
• 《滿剌加》開船，用辰巽針，五更船平《射箭山》。
  • 用辰巽針，三更船平《毘宋嶼》。
  • 用丹巽針，取《吉利》。
properties.translationHtml:
• From the entrance to Malacca, sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to be even with Mount Banang ().
  • Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to be even with Banana Island ().
  • Sail on a course of 135º (巽, SE) to reach Great Karimun ().

properties.name: Great Karimun to Longyamen
properties.text: 《吉利》門五更船，用乙辰及丹辰針，取《長腰嶼》。 出《龍牙門》。
properties.translation: From Karimun Gate, sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) and 120º (辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Pulau Senang (). Exit at Longyamen ().
properties.millsTranslation: From Jilimen [Little Karimun island, 103 24' E], for 5 watches the ship steers 105-120 and [then] exactly 120, makes Changyao xu [Pulau Satumu, Raffles Lighthouse], and goes out through Longya strait.
properties.textHtml:
• 《吉利》門五更船，用乙辰及丹辰針，取《長腰嶼》。
  • 出《龍牙門》。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Karimun Gate, sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) and 120º (辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Pulau Senang ().
  • Exit at Longyamen ().

properties.name: Longyamen to Baijiao
properties.text: 《龍牙門》，用甲卯針，五更船取《白礁》。
properties.translation: From Longyamen, sail on a course of 82.5º (甲卯, ENE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Baijiao.
properties.millsTranslation: From Longya strait, steering 75-90 [f. 15] for 5 watches, the ship makes Baijiao [Pedra Branca, 104 24' E].
properties.textHtml: • 《龍牙門》，用甲卯針，五更船取《白礁》。
properties.translationHtml: • From Longyamen, sail on a course of 82.5º (甲卯, ENE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Baijiao.

properties.name: Baijiao to Dongzhushan
properties.text: 《白礁》過用癸丑及丹癸針五更船平《東竹山》外過。
properties.translation: When passing Baijiao, sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to pass outside Dongzhushan.
properties.millsTranslation: After passing Baijiao [Pedra Branca, 1º 19' N] steer 15º-30º and [then] exactly 15º; after 5 watches the ship is level with Dongzhu shan [Pulau Aur, 2º 26' N], and passes outside it.
properties.textHtml: • 《白礁》過用癸丑及丹癸針五更船平《東竹山》外過。
properties.translationHtml: • When passing Baijiao, sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to pass outside Dongzhushan.

properties.name: Dongzhushan to Kunlun
properties.text: 《東竹山》過，用子丑及丹癸針，船取《崑崙山》外過。
properties.translation: When passing Dongzhushan sail on a course of 352.5º (子丑???, NNW) and 15º (癸, NNE) to pass outside Kunlun.
properties.millsTranslation: After passing Dongzhu shan, steer 0-30 and [then] exactly 15; [f 14v] the ship makes Kunlun shan [Grand Condore, 8 41' N], and passes outside it. [f. 13]
properties.textHtml: • 《東竹山》過，用子丑及丹癸針，船取《崑崙山》外過。
properties.translationHtml: • When passing Dongzhushan sail on a course of 352.5º (子丑???, NNW) and 15º (癸, NNE) to pass outside Kunlun.

properties.name: Kunlun to Kê Gà
properties.text: 《崑崙山》外渦，用癸丑針，十五更船取《赤坎山》。 用丑艮及丹艮。
properties.translation: When passing outside Kunlun, sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNW) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Kê Gà. Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) and 45º (艮, NE).
properties.millsTranslation: After passing on the outside of Kunlun shan steer 15-30; after 15 watches the ship makes Chikan shan [Point Ke Ga, 10 41' N, 107 59' E]. Steer 30-45 and [then] exactly 45
properties.textHtml:
• 《崑崙山》外渦，用癸丑針，十五更船取《赤坎山》。
  • 用丑艮及丹艮。
properties.translationHtml:
• When passing outside Kunlun, sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNW) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Kê Gà.
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) and 45º (艮, NE).

properties.name: Đá Bia Mountain to Phương Mai
properties.text: 《靈山》，用壬子及丹壬針，五更船平《洋嶼》取《筊杯山(嶼)》。
properties.translation: From Đá Bia Mountain, sail on a course of 352.5º (壬子, NNW) and 345º (壬, NNW) for 12 hours (5 更) until even with Cu Lao Xanh to reach Phương Mai.
properties.millsTranslation: [f. 12v] From Lingshan steer 345-360 and [then] exactly 345; after 5 watches the ship [f 12] is level with Yangxu [Poulo Gambir, 13 37' N], and [then] makes Jiaobeishan [Nui Ong Co and Nui Ong Can, 13 54' N].
properties.textHtml: • 《靈山》，用壬子及丹壬針，五更船平《洋嶼》取《筊杯山(嶼)》。
properties.translationHtml: • From Đá Bia Mountain, sail on a course of 352.5º (壬子, NNW) and 345º (壬, NNW) for 12 hours (5 更) until even with Cu Lao Xanh to reach Phương Mai.

properties.name: Phương Mai to Cù-Lao Ré
properties.text: 《筊杯山(嶼)》，用壬子針，七更船取《外羅山》外過。
properties.translation: From Phương Mai, sail on a course of 352.5º (壬子, NNW) for 21.6 hours (9 更) to reach the outer coast of Cù-Lao Ré.
properties.millsTranslation: From Jiaobeishan steer 345-360; after 7 watches the ship makes Wailuoshan [Culao Re, 15 23' N], and passes outside it.
properties.textHtml: • 《筊杯山(嶼)》，用壬子針，七更船取《外羅山》外過。
properties.translationHtml: • From Phương Mai, sail on a course of 352.5º (壬子, NNW) for 21.6 hours (9 更) to reach the outer coast of Cù-Lao Ré.

properties.name: Cù-Lao Ré to Duzhushan
properties.text: 《外羅山》內過，(用)癸丑及单癸針，二十一更船平《獨豬山》。
properties.translation: When passing inside Cù-Lao Ré, sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNW) and 15º (癸, NNE) for 50.4 hours (21 更) until even with Duzhushan.
properties.millsTranslation: [f 11v] Passing on the inside of Wailuoshan, [steer] 15-30 and [then] exactly 15; after 21 watches the ship is level with Duzhushan [Dazhoudao, 18 40' N, 110 28' E].
properties.textHtml: • 《外羅山》內過，(用)癸丑及单癸針，二十一更船平《獨豬山》。
properties.translationHtml: • When passing inside Cù-Lao Ré, sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNW) and 15º (癸, NNE) for 50.4 hours (21 更) until even with Duzhushan.

properties.name: Duzhushan to Daxingjian
properties.text: 《獨豬山》，(用)丹艮針，五更船。 用艮寅針，十更船平《大星尖》外過。
properties.translation: From Duzhushan, sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 12 hours (5 更). Sail on a course of 52.5º (艮寅, ENE) for 24 hours (10 更) to be level with Daxingjian, on the outside.
properties.millsTranslation: From Duzhushan (Dazhoudao, 18º 40' N, 110º 28' E), steer exactly 45 degrees for 5 watches; the ship steers 45-60 degrees for 10 watches, [other books indicate that the total of 15 watches shold be changed to 25.] comes level with Daxingjian (Pedro Blanco, 22º 19' N), and passes outside it.
properties.textHtml:
• 《獨豬山》，(用)丹艮針，五更船。
  • 用艮寅針，十更船平《大星尖》外過。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Duzhushan, sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 12 hours (5 更).
  • Sail on a course of 52.5º (艮寅, ENE) for 24 hours (10 更) to be level with Daxingjian, on the outside.

properties.name: Daxingjian to Dawushan
properties.text: 《大星尖》，用丹寅針，十五更船平《南粵山》。 《外平山》外過，用寅針，三更船平《大甘》《小甘》外過。 用丹艮針，四更船平《大武山》。
properties.translation: From Daxingjian, sail on a course of 60º (寅, ENE) for 36 hours (15 更) until even with Nan'ao Island. Passing outside Waipingshan, sail on a course of 60º (寅, ENE) for 7.6 hours (3 更) to pass outside Dagan and Xiaogan. Sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until even with Dawushan.
properties.millsTranslation: From Daxingjian steer exactly 60 degrees. After 15 watches the ship is level with Nan'ao shan (23º 25' N) and Waipengshan (Nanpingdao) and passes outside them.  Steer 45 to 60 degrees, after 3 watches the ship is level with Dagan and Xiaogan (Brothers islands, 23º 33' N) and passes outside them.  Steer exactly 45 degrees; after 4 watches the ship is level with Dawushan (24º 20' N).
properties.textHtml:
• 《大星尖》，用丹寅針，十五更船平《南粵山》。
  • 《外平山》外過，用寅針，三更船平《大甘》《小甘》外過。
  • 用丹艮針，四更船平《大武山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Daxingjian, sail on a course of 60º (寅, ENE) for 36 hours (15 更) until even with Nan'ao Island.
  • Passing outside Waipingshan, sail on a course of 60º (寅, ENE) for 7.6 hours (3 更) to pass outside Dagan and Xiaogan.
  • Sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until even with Dawushan.

properties.name: Dawushan to Wuqiushan
properties.text: 《大武山》，用丹艮針，七更船平《烏邱山》。
properties.translation: From Dawushan, sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 16.8 hours (7 更) until even with Wuqiushan.
properties.millsTranslation: From Dawushan steer exactly 45 degrees; after 7 watches the ship is level with Wuqiushan (Wuqiuxu, 24º 59' N).
properties.textHtml: • 《大武山》，用丹艮針，七更船平《烏邱山》。
properties.translationHtml: • From Dawushan, sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 16.8 hours (7 更) until even with Wuqiushan.

properties.name: Wuqiushan to Dongshashan
properties.text: 《烏邱山》，用艮寅針，四更船平《牛山(者)》。 用丑艮針，五更船取《東沙山》。
properties.translation: From Wuqiushan, sail on a course of 52.5º (艮寅, ENE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until even with Niushan. Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Dongshashan.
properties.millsTranslation: From Wuqiushan steer 45-60 degrees; after 4 watches the ship is level with Niushan, 25º 25' N. Steer 30-45 degrees. After 5 watches, the ship makes Dongshashan (Xichuandao, 25º 58' N).
properties.textHtml:
• 《烏邱山》，用艮寅針，四更船平《牛山(者)》。
  • 用丑艮針，五更船取《東沙山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Wuqiushan, sail on a course of 52.5º (艮寅, ENE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until even with Niushan.
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Dongshashan.

properties.name: Dongshashan to Wuhu Reef
properties.text: 《東沙山》，用丑艮針，一更船平《官塘山》。 用丑艮針，一更船《五虎山》。 用丑艮針，三更船取《龜嶼》。 用丑艮針，一更船取《東湧山》外過。
properties.translation: From Dongshashan, following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Guantangshan. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours (1 更) to Wuhu Reef. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to Kusu. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass outside Dongyongshan.
properties.millsTranslation: From Dongshashan steer 30-45 degrees. After 1 watch the ship is level with Guantangshan (Jixingjiao, 26º 05' N). [wrong here; and map is wrong in indicating that Guantangshan is on the east of the course from Dongsha to Guixu.]  Steer 30-45 degrees, after 1 watch the ship makes Wuhushan (Huangqishan).  Steer 30-45 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Guixu (Dongsha, 26º 09' N0. Steer 30-45 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Dongyongshan (Dongyinshan, 26º 22' N), and passes outside it.
properties.textHtml:
• 《東沙山》，用丑艮針，一更船平《官塘山》。
  • 用丑艮針，一更船《五虎山》。
  • 用丑艮針，三更船取《龜嶼》。
  • 用丑艮針，一更船取《東湧山》外過。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Dongshashan, following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Guantangshan.
  • Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours (1 更) to Wuhu Reef.
  • Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to Kusu.
  • Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass outside Dongyongshan.

properties.name: Dongyongshan to Nanji
properties.text: 《東湧山》，用丑艮針，二更船平《東乗山》《西乗山》。 用丑艮針，二更船平《臺山》。 用丑艮針，三更船取《南己》。
properties.translation: From Dongyongshan, following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) until even with Dongchengshan and Xichengshan. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) until even with Taishan. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Nanji.
properties.millsTranslation: From Dongyongshan steer 30-45 degrees. After 2 watches the ship is level with Dongqishan (Nanshuangdao) and Xiqishan (Beishuangdao). Steer 30-45 degrees. After 2 watches the ship is level with Taishan (26º 59' N Steer 30-45 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Nanji (27º 28' N)
properties.textHtml:
• 《東湧山》，用丑艮針，二更船平《東乗山》《西乗山》。
  • 用丑艮針，二更船平《臺山》。
  • 用丑艮針，三更船取《南己》。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Dongyongshan, following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) until even with Dongchengshan and Xichengshan.
  • Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) until even with Taishan.
  • Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Nanji.

properties.name: Nanji to Damianshan
properties.text: 用丑艮針，二更船取《東洛山》。 用丑艮針，一更船平《中界山》及《黄山》。 用癸丑針，三更船取《狹山》外過。 用癸丑針，三更船平《直谷山》。 用癸丑針，二更船取《羊琪山》及《大陳》《三母山》。 用子癸針，二更船取《東西岳山》。 用子癸針，三更船取《檀(佛)頭山》外過。 對開有礁内外過船。 東北邊有沉礁打辰，子細內外過船。
properties.translation: Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Dongluoshan. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Zhongjieshan and Huangshan. Following the course 22.5º (癸丑, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass outside Dishan. Following the course 22.5º (癸丑, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) until even with Jigu Island. Following the course 22.5º (癸丑, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Yangqishan, Xiadachen Island, and Shangdachen Island. Following the course 7.5º (子癸, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach the Dongji Islands. Following the course 7.5º (子癸, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass outside Tantoushan. There is a reef far outside. Sail inside or outside. The northeast side has a sunken reef making waves, sail inside or outside carefully.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 30-45 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Dongleshan (Beijishan) Steer 30-45 degrees. After 1 watch the ship is level with Zhongjieshan (Beiceshan?) and Huangshan (Banmianshan?) Steer 15-30 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Xiashan (Pishan), 28º 05' N, and passes outside it. Steer 15-30 degrees. After 3 watches the ship is level with Zhigushan (28º 23' N) Steer 15-30 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Yangqishan (Pingfengshan) and Dachen (Xia Da chen shan) and Sanmushan (Shang Da chen shan) Steer 0-15 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Dong Xi Qishan (Dongjishan and Gaodao) Steer 0-15 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Dantoushan (29º 10' N), and passes outside it; Appearing opposite is a rock; the ship can pass inside or outside it; on the northeast side there is a sunken rock on which the waves break, [navigate] carefully; the ship can pass inside or outside it.
properties.textHtml:
• 用丑艮針，二更船取《東洛山》。
  • 用丑艮針，一更船平《中界山》及《黄山》。
  • 用癸丑針，三更船取《狹山》外過。
  • 用癸丑針，三更船平《直谷山》。
  • 用癸丑針，二更船取《羊琪山》及《大陳》《三母山》。
  • 用子癸針，二更船取《東西岳山》。
  • 用子癸針，三更船取《檀(佛)頭山》外過。
  • 對開有礁内外過船。
  • 東北邊有沉礁打辰，子細內外過船。
properties.translationHtml:
• Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Dongluoshan.
  • Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Zhongjieshan and Huangshan.
  • Following the course 22.5º (癸丑, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass outside Dishan.
  • Following the course 22.5º (癸丑, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) until even with Jigu Island.
  • Following the course 22.5º (癸丑, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Yangqishan, Xiadachen Island, and Shangdachen Island.
  • Following the course 7.5º (子癸, NNE), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach the Dongji Islands.
  • Following the course 7.5º (子癸, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass outside Tantoushan.
  • There is a reef far outside. Sail inside or outside.
  • The northeast side has a sunken reef making waves, sail inside or outside carefully.

properties.name: Damianshan to Taicang Port
properties.text: 用子癸針，三更船取《九山》及《乱礁洋》。 用壬子針，二更船過順《孝(順)洋》取《雙嶼港》。 用癸丑針，一更船取《昇羅嶼》《廟州門》刈過轄《碕頭》。 用辛戌針，一更船取《大磨山》。 用乾亥針，二更船出《西後門》。 用丹子針，取《(東)霍山》。 用丹子及子癸針，三更船取《灘山》。 用癸丑針，三更船取《七山》。 用乾亥針，四更船見《茶山》。 用酉辛針，三更船取《南滙嘴》收汧平宝山。 用辛酉針，三更船取《吳淞江》到《太倉港口》軗系船。
properties.translation: Following the course 7.5º (子癸, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Jiushan and Chaos Reef. Following the course 352.5° (壬子, NNW), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to pass Xiaoyang and Shuangyu Port. Following the course 22.5° (癸丑, NNE), sail 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Shengluo Island, Miaozhou Gate, & [unknown]. Following the course 292.5° (辛戌, WNW), sail 2.4 hours (2 更) to reach Damoshan. Following the course 322.5° (乾亥, NNW), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to exit Blackwell Pass. Sail due north to reach Lingshan. Following the course 7.5° (子癸, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Tanhu Island. Following the course 22.5° (癸丑, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Qishan Islands. Following the course 322.5° (乾亥, NNW), sail 9.6 hours (4 更) to reach Chashan. Following the course 277.5° (酉辛, WNW), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach a point level with Nanhuizui.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 0-15 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Jiushan (29º 26' N) and Luanjiaoyang (southern portion of Niubishan Channel) Steer 345-360 degrees. After 2 watches the ship passes Xiaoshanyang (northern portion of Niubishan channel), and makes Shuangxujiang (Duffield pass). Steer 15-30 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Shenglexu (Xingleshan) and Miaozhoumen (the channel between Roundabout island and the coast), passes within the latter and goes round Qitou (29º 53' N). Steer 285-300 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Damoshan (Damaoshan). Steer 315-330 degrees. After 2 watches the ship goes out through Xihoumen (Blackwall pass). Steer exactly 0 degrees and make Heshan (Dongheshan, 30º 15' N). Steer exactly 0 degrees, and then 0-15 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Tanshan (Tanhushan). Steer 15-30 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Qishan (Daqishan, 30º 48' N) Steer 315-330 degrees. After 4 watches the ship sights Chashan. Steer 285-270 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Nanhuizui, leaves the main, and comes level with Baoshan (Zhaobaoshan, near Gaoqiao).
properties.textHtml:
• 用子癸針，三更船取《九山》及《乱礁洋》。
  • 用壬子針，二更船過順《孝(順)洋》取《雙嶼港》。
  • 用癸丑針，一更船取《昇羅嶼》《廟州門》刈過轄《碕頭》。
  • 用辛戌針，一更船取《大磨山》。
  • 用乾亥針，二更船出《西後門》。
  • 用丹子針，取《(東)霍山》。
  • 用丹子及子癸針，三更船取《灘山》。
  • 用癸丑針，三更船取《七山》。
  • 用乾亥針，四更船見《茶山》。
  • 用酉辛針，三更船取《南滙嘴》收汧平宝山。
  • 用辛酉針，三更船取《吳淞江》到《太倉港口》軗系船。
properties.translationHtml:
• Following the course 7.5º (子癸, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Jiushan and Chaos Reef.
  • Following the course 352.5° (壬子, NNW), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to pass Xiaoyang and Shuangyu Port.
  • Following the course 22.5° (癸丑, NNE), sail 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Shengluo Island, Miaozhou Gate, & [unknown].
  • Following the course 292.5° (辛戌, WNW), sail 2.4 hours (2 更) to reach Damoshan.
  • Following the course 322.5° (乾亥, NNW), sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to exit Blackwell Pass.
  • Sail due north to reach Lingshan.
  • Following the course 7.5° (子癸, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Tanhu Island.
  • Following the course 22.5° (癸丑, NNE), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Qishan Islands.
  • Following the course 322.5° (乾亥, NNW), sail 9.6 hours (4 更) to reach Chashan.
  • Following the course 277.5° (酉辛, WNW), sail 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach a point level with Nanhuizui.

properties.name: Sumatra to Ambergris
properties.text: 《蘇門答剌》開船，用乾戍針，十二更，船平《龍涎嶼》。
properties.translation: Sailing from Sumadera Pasai, follow the course 307.5° (乾戍, WNW) for 28.8 hours (12 更) to sail even with Pulau Breueh.
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Sumendala [Kuala Pasai, 97 13' E]; steer 315-300; after 12 watches the ship is level with [f. 18] Longxianxu [Poulo Rondo, 95 07' E]
properties.textHtml: • 《蘇門答剌》開船，用乾戍針，十二更，船平《龍涎嶼》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sailing from Sumadera Pasai, follow the course 307.5° (乾戍, WNW) for 28.8 hours (12 更) to sail even with Pulau Breueh.

properties.name: Longxianyu to Ceylon via Nicobar
properties.text: 《龍涎嶼》開船時月，用辛戍針，十更船見《翠藍嶼》。 用辛針，三十更船。 用辛酉針，五十更船見《錫蘭山》。
properties.translation: When starting from Longxianyu, follow the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sailing for 24 hours (10 更) to see Great Nicobar Island. Following the course 285° (辛, WNW), sail 3 days  (30 更). Following the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sail 5 days to see Ceylon  (50 更).
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Longxian xu [Poulo Rondo] during a favourable month; steer 285-300; after 10 [f. 18v] watches the ship sees Cuilan xu [Nicobar islands]. Steer exactly 285 for 30 watches; [then] the ship steers 285-270 for 50 watches, and the ship sees Xilan [f. 19] shan [Ceylon].
properties.textHtml:
• 《龍涎嶼》開船時月，用辛戍針，十更船見《翠藍嶼》。
  • 用辛針，三十更船。
  • 用辛酉針，五十更船見《錫蘭山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• When starting from Longxianyu, follow the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sailing for 24 hours (10 更) to see Great Nicobar Island.
  • Following the course 285° (辛, WNW), sail 3 days (30 更).
  • Following the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sail 5 days to see Ceylon (50 更).

properties.name: Longxianyu to Ceylon (direct)
properties.text: 《龍涎嶼》開船過洋，用丹辛針，四十更船。 又用辛酉針，五十更船見《錫蘭山》。
properties.translation: When starting cross-sea from Longxianyu, follow the course 292.5° (辛戌, WNW), sailing for 4 days (40 更). Then, follow the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sailing 5 days (50 更) to see Ceylon.
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Longxian xu [Poulo Rondo] and crosses the ocean. Steer exactly 285 [f. 18v] for 40 watches; the ship again steers 285-270 for 50 watches; [then] the ship sees Xilan shan [Ceylon].
properties.textHtml:
• 《龍涎嶼》開船過洋，用丹辛針，四十更船。
  • 又用辛酉針，五十更船見《錫蘭山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• When starting cross-sea from Longxianyu, follow the course 292.5° (辛戌, WNW), sailing for 4 days (40 更).
  • Then, follow the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sailing 5 days (50 更) to see Ceylon.

properties.name: Around Ceylon
properties.text: 干千《佛堂》，用丹庚針。
properties.translation: From the Ten Thousand Buddha temple, follow the course 255° (庚, WSW).
properties.millsTranslation: From Fuotang [Dondra head] steer exactly 255.
properties.textHtml: • 干千《佛堂》，用丹庚針。
properties.translationHtml: • From the Ten Thousand Buddha temple, follow the course 255° (庚, WSW).

properties.name: To Malé
properties.text: 用庚酉針四十五更船取《官嶼》。
properties.translation: Following the course 262.5° (庚酉, WSW), sail 36 hours (15 更) to reach Malé.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 255-270; after 45 watches make Guanxu [Male island].
properties.textHtml: • 用庚酉針四十五更船取《官嶼》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 262.5° (庚酉, WSW), sail 36 hours (15 更) to reach Malé.

properties.name: Malé to Ras Ma'bar
properties.text: 《官嶼》澑，用庚酉針，一百五十更船取《木骨都(束)》。
properties.translation: Passing Malé, following the course 262.5° (庚酉, WSW), sail 15 days (150 更) to reach Mogadishu.
properties.millsTranslation: From Guanxu liu [Male island], steer 255-270; after 150 watches the ship makes Mugudu [Mugudushu, Mogadishu].
properties.textHtml: • 《官嶼》澑，用庚酉針，一百五十更船取《木骨都(束)》。
properties.translationHtml: • Passing Malé, following the course 262.5° (庚酉, WSW), sail 15 days (150 更) to reach Mogadishu.

properties.name: Colombo to Maldives atolls
properties.text: 用辛酉(針)，四十五更(船)取《任不知(溜)》。
properties.translation: Following the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sail 4.5 days (45 更) to reach the Maldives atolls.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 285-270; after 45 watches make Renbuzhi [Fadiffolu atoll].
properties.textHtml: • 用辛酉(針)，四十五更(船)取《任不知(溜)》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sail 4.5 days (45 更) to reach the Maldives atolls.

properties.name: Colombo to Kelaa
properties.text: 用辛戌針，五十更(船)，取《起來(溜)》。
properties.translation: Following the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sail 5 days (50 更) to reach Kelaa.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 285-300; after 50 watches make Qilai [Kelai island].
properties.textHtml: • 用辛戌針，五十更(船)，取《起來(溜)》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sail 5 days (50 更) to reach Kelaa.

properties.name: Colombo to Gapingnian
properties.text: 用丹戌針，五十五更(船)，取《加平年(溜)》。
properties.translation: Following the course 300° (戌, WNW), sail 5.5 days (55 更) to reach the Gapingnian Passage.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer exactly 300; after 55 watches make Jiapingnian [Kalpeni atoll].
properties.textHtml: • 用丹戌針，五十五更(船)，取《加平年(溜)》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 300° (戌, WNW), sail 5.5 days (55 更) to reach the Gapingnian Passage.

properties.name: Malé to Gambari
properties.text: 用甲卯針，二十九更船，取《甘巴里(頭)》。
properties.translation: Following the course 82.5° (甲卯, ENE), sail 70 hours (29 更) to reach Gambari.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 75-90; after 29 watches the ship makes Ganbali [Cape Comorin].
properties.textHtml: • 用甲卯針，二十九更船，取《甘巴里(頭)》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 82.5° (甲卯, ENE), sail 70 hours (29 更) to reach Gambari.

properties.name: Malé to Kollam
properties.text: 用丹甲針，四十五更船，取《小葛蘭》。
properties.translation: Following the course 75° (甲, ENE), sail 4.5 days (45 更) to reach Kollam.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer exactly 75; after 45 watches the ship makes Xiao Gelan [Quilon].
properties.textHtml: • 用丹甲針，四十五更船，取《小葛蘭》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 75° (甲, ENE), sail 4.5 days (45 更) to reach Kollam.

properties.name: Gapingnian Passage to Kochi
properties.text: 用乙卯針，二十五更(船)，取《柯枝國》。
properties.translation: Following the course 97.5° (乙卯, ESE), sail 60 hours (25 更) to reach Kochi.
properties.millsTranslation: [Steer] 60; after 25 watches you make Kezhi [Cochin].
properties.textHtml: • 用乙卯針，二十五更(船)，取《柯枝國》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 97.5° (乙卯, ESE), sail 60 hours (25 更) to reach Kochi.

properties.name: Gapingnian Passage to Calicut
properties.text: 用甲卯針，二十八更船，取《古里國》。
properties.translation: Following the course 82.5° (甲卯, ENE), sail 67.2 hours (28 更) to reach Kozhikode.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 75-90; after 28 watches the ship reaches the country of Guli [Calicut].
properties.textHtml: • 用甲卯針，二十八更船，取《古里國》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 82.5° (甲卯, ENE), sail 67.2 hours (28 更) to reach Kozhikode.

properties.name: African Coast to Hafun
properties.text: 在華蓋星五指內， 去到北長星四指坐斗上山扮 坐癸丑針，六十五更船，取《葛兒得風》《哈甫兒》雨
properties.translation: At 5.4° S latitude, go to 10.3° N, follow on the star [unknown] Following the course 22.5° (癸丑, NNE), sail for 6.5 days (65 更) to reach Cape Guardafui and Hafun.
properties.textHtml:
• 在華蓋星五指內，
  • 去到北長星四指坐斗上山扮
  • 坐癸丑針，六十五更船，取《葛兒得風》《哈甫兒》雨
properties.translationHtml:
• At 5.4° S latitude,
  • go to 10.3° N, follow on the star [unknown]
  • Following the course 22.5° (癸丑, NNE), sail for 6.5 days (65 更) to reach Cape Guardafui and Hafun.

properties.name: Andouli to Kavaratti
properties.text: 用卯針，十六更船，取《加加溜》。
properties.translation: Following the course 90° (卯, east), sail 38.4 hours (16 更) to reach Kavaratti Island.
properties.textHtml: • 用卯針，十六更船，取《加加溜》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 90° (卯, east), sail 38.4 hours (16 更) to reach Kavaratti Island.

properties.name: Andouli to Calicut
properties.text: 用卯針，十五更船，取《古里國》。
properties.translation: Following the course 90° (卯, east), sail 36 hours (15 更) to reach Kozhikode.
properties.textHtml: • 用卯針，十五更船，取《古里國》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 90° (卯, east), sail 36 hours (15 更) to reach Kozhikode.

properties.name: Mangalore to Calicut
properties.text: 用丹乙針，二十八更(船)，收《古里國》。
properties.translation: Following the course 105° (乙, ESE), sail 67.2 hours (28 更) to reach Kozhikode.
properties.textHtml: • 用丹乙針，二十八更(船)，收《古里國》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 105° (乙, ESE), sail 67.2 hours (28 更) to reach Kozhikode.

properties.name: TBD
properties.text: 在三指，觜頭山勢，去到六指二角直遶《那里》，寅上。 又在六指二角內山指坐《布司》上。 用丹艮(針)，十指去到十一指坐取船。
properties.translation: At 9.7° N latitude, before the mountain, go to 14.3° N straight around 'That' Tiger rising[?]. Then, at 14.3° N latitude in the mountain, ride to Busi Star rising. Following the course 45° (艮, NE), from 20.0° N latitude go to 20.4° N.
properties.textHtml:
• 在三指，觜頭山勢，去到六指二角直遶《那里》，寅上。
  • 又在六指二角內山指坐《布司》上。
  • 用丹艮(針)，十指去到十一指坐取船。
properties.translationHtml:
• At 9.7° N latitude, before the mountain, go to 14.3° N straight around 'That' Tiger rising[?].
  • Then, at 14.3° N latitude in the mountain, ride to Busi Star rising.
  • Following the course 45° (艮, NE), from 20.0° N latitude go to 20.4° N.

properties.name: Mangalore to Qalhat
properties.text: 用丹戌針，八十五更(船) 又用辛戌針，四十更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translation: Following the course 300° (戌, WNW), sail 8.5 days (85 更). Then, following the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sail 4 days (40 更) to reach Qalhat.
properties.textHtml:
• 用丹戌針，八十五更(船)
  • 又用辛戌針，四十更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Following the course 300° (戌, WNW), sail 8.5 days (85 更).
  • Then, following the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sail 4 days (40 更) to reach Qalhat.

properties.name: Anjediva to Qalhat (A)
properties.text: 用辛戌針，一百更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translation: Following the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sail 10 days (100 更) to reach Qalhat.
properties.textHtml: • 用辛戌針，一百更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sail 10 days (100 更) to reach Qalhat.

properties.name: Anjediva to Qalhat (B)
properties.text: 用丹戌針，一百二更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translation: Following the course 300° (戌, WNW), sail 10.2 days (102 更) to reach Qalhat.
properties.textHtml: • 用丹戌針，一百二更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 300° (戌, WNW), sail 10.2 days (102 更) to reach Qalhat.

properties.name: Goa to Qalhat
properties.text: 用辛酉針，八十七更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translation: Following the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sail 8.7 days (87 更) to reach Qalhat.
properties.textHtml: • 用辛酉針，八十七更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translationHtml: • Following the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sail 8.7 days (87 更) to reach Qalhat.

properties.name: TBD
properties.text: 九指二角，用丹辛針，一百六十六更船收《都里馬新富》。
properties.translation: From 19.2° N latitude, following the course 285° (辛, WNW), sail 16.6 days (166 更) to reach the Musandam Peninsula.
properties.textHtml: • 九指二角，用丹辛針，一百六十六更船收《都里馬新富》。
properties.translationHtml: • From 19.2° N latitude, following the course 285° (辛, WNW), sail 16.6 days (166 更) to reach the Musandam Peninsula.

properties.name: TBD
properties.text: 此角頭也有十指 在十指《山執力》 去到十二指《吳實記落》 不到丹戌
properties.translation: This penisula also has latitude 20.0° N. At 20.0° N latitude [unknown] Go to 23.2° N latitude for Sir Creek. Do not go to the course  300° (戌, WNW).
properties.textHtml:
• 此角頭也有十指
  • 在十指《山執力》
  • 去到十二指《吳實記落》
  • 不到丹戌
properties.translationHtml:
• This penisula also has latitude 20.0° N.
  • At 20.0° N latitude [unknown]
  • Go to 23.2° N latitude for Sir Creek.
  • Do not go to the course 300° (戌, WNW).

properties.name: TBD
properties.text: 指坐布司上，用丹艮(針)。 十指去到十一指坐取船。
properties.translation: ?-finger on 布司 (Pegasus?) use bearing 艮 (45°, NE) From 20.0° N latitude, sail to 21.6° N [something about riding...].
properties.textHtml:
• 指坐布司上，用丹艮(針)。
  • 十指去到十一指坐取船。
properties.translationHtml:
• ?-finger on 布司 (Pegasus?) use bearing 艮 (45°, NE)
  • From 20.0° N latitude, sail to 21.6° N [something about riding...].

properties.name: TBD
properties.text: 觜頭去到十二指，坐乾亥《小斗》落。 又在十二指觜頭去到十二指二角。 坐乾丹布司落。 又去到十二指觜頭，(用)子針五十更船收《忽魯莫斯》。
properties.translation: Before going to 23.2° N latitude, ride on a course of 322.5° (乾亥, NNW) toward Little Dipper falling. Again, before you're at 23.2° N latitude, go to 24° N. Ride on a course of 315° (乾, NW) toward the Pu-ssu star. Again, before going to go to 23.2° N latitude, sail due north (子) for 5 days (50 更) to arrive at Hormuz.
properties.textHtml:
• 觜頭去到十二指，坐乾亥《小斗》落。
  • 又在十二指觜頭去到十二指二角。
  • 坐乾丹布司落。
  • 又去到十二指觜頭，(用)子針五十更船收《忽魯莫斯》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Before going to 23.2° N latitude, ride on a course of 322.5° (乾亥, NNW) toward Little Dipper falling.
  • Again, before you're at 23.2° N latitude, go to 24° N.
  • Ride on a course of 315° (乾, NW) toward the Pu-ssu star.
  • Again, before going to go to 23.2° N latitude, sail due north (子) for 5 days (50 更) to arrive at Hormuz.

properties.name: TBD
properties.text: 去十三指二角坐正北。
properties.translation: Go to 25.6° N latitude and ride it straight across.
properties.textHtml: • 去十三指二角坐正北。
properties.translationHtml: • Go to 25.6° N latitude and ride it straight across.

properties.name: Minicoy to Calicut
properties.text: 船收《古里國》，(用)寅針五十更。
properties.translation: To sail to Kozhikode, follow a course of 60° (寅, ENE) for 5 days (50 更).
properties.textHtml: • 船收《古里國》，(用)寅針五十更。
properties.translationHtml: • To sail to Kozhikode, follow a course of 60° (寅, ENE) for 5 days (50 更).

properties.name: Minicoy to Cochin
properties.text: (用)寅針二十五更收《柯枝》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 60° (寅, ENE) for 2 days (20 更) to arrive in Kochi.
properties.textHtml: • (用)寅針二十五更收《柯枝》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 60° (寅, ENE) for 2 days (20 更) to arrive in Kochi.

properties.millsTranslation: [There is a hiatus in respect of the voyage to Ling shan [Cape Varella]; 'Shunfeng' gives the stages as 5 watches from Chikan shan [Point Ke Ga] to Luowantou [Cape Padaran, 11 22' N], 5 watches to Qienanmao shan [Hon Heo mountain, 12 24' N, 109 16 E], 3 watches to Ling shan [Cape Varella, 12 54' N].]

[Since Zheng He or his delegate often went to Thailand, we set out the main stages (as given in 'Shun-feng') for the voyages from Grand Condore to Thailand and thence to Pedra Branca on the main route to India. From Kunlun shan [Grand Condore, 106 36' E], 3 watches to Xiao Kunlun shan [The Brothers, 106 07' E]; 8 watches to Zhenxu shan [Non Khoai, 104 49' E]. From Zhenxu shan, 10 watches to Daheng shan [Poulo Panjang, 103 23' E]; 5 watches to Xiaoheng shan [Poulo Wai, 102 51' E]; 20 watches to Bijiashan [Khao Samroiyot 12 14' N]; 10 watches to Wuniqian [the mudbank off Hlaem Phak Bia, 13 01' N]. From Wuniqian, 3 watches to Zhuxu [the mudbank off Ban Hlaem village, 13 12' N]; and 5 watches to the shallows [off Maenam Mae Klong, 13 21' N]. On the southward journey ships followed the coast from KhaoSamroiyou; 5 watches to Guishan [Ko Hluam, 11 45' N]; 10 watches to Fuoxu [Ko lang, 10 51' N]. From Fuoxu, 10 watches to Da Sumeishan [Ko Samui, 9 27' N]; 15 watches to Daimeishan [Ko Krah, 8 25' N]; 10 watches to Suguna [Songkhla, 7 11' N]; 5 watches to Danijiang kou [Pattani river estuary, 6 54' N]. From Danijiang kou, 7 watches to Jilandan jiangkou [Kelantan river estuary, 6 11' N]; 4 watches to Sanjuexu [Pulau Perhentian Besar, 5 53' N]. From Sanjuexu, 3 watches to Jueyuanshan [Pulau Bidong Laut, 5 36' N]. From Jueyuanshan, 3 watches to Mianhuaxu [Pulau Kapas, 5 12' N]; 5 watches to Douxu [Pulau Tenggol, 4 49' N]; 5 watches to Pengheng jiangkou [Pahang river estuary, 3 31' N]; 5 watches to Qupan shan [Pulau Tioman, 2 46' N]. From Qupanshan, 11 watches to Baijiao [Pedra Branca, 1 19' N].

From Jilimen [Little Karimun island, 103 24' E], for 5 watches the ship steers 105-120 and [then] exactly 120, makes Changyao xu [Pulau Satumu, Raffles Lighthouse], and goes out through Longya strait. From Longya strait, steering 75-90 [f. 15] for 5 watches, the ship makes Baijiao [Pedra Branca, 104 24' E].

[The map contains no sailing directions; we can, however, set out the main stages derived from other sources. From Ling shan [Cape Varella, 12 54' N] 13 watches to Dongxidong [Great Catwick and Poulo Sapatu, 9 59' N]; 45 watches to Dongshelong shan [Tandjung Datu, 2 05' N]; 11 watches to Jialimada [Karimata island, 1 36' S]; 10 watches to Jiaolan shan [Gelam islet, 2 53' S]; 30 watches to Jilimen shan [Karimundjawa islands, 5 52' S]; 4 watches to Baolao'an shan [Djapara mountain, that is, Murjo Pegunungan, 6 35' S, 110 52' E]; 8 watches to Nacan shan [Lasem Pegunungan, 111 31' E]; 2 watches to Duban shan [Tuban, 112 04' E]; and 5 watches to Xincun [Gresik, 7 09' S, 112 39' E], or alternatively to Raodong [Jaratan].]

[The map contains no sailing directions. 'Shun-feng' (ff. 43-5) gives directions for voyages from Atjeh in Sumatra in Banten in Java, and we attempt a provisional explanation of the main stages. From Aqi [Atjeh, Kutaradja], 1 watch to Mantu mountain [Udjung Masam Muka, 5 35' N, 95 13' E]], 39 watches to Maolu [Barus, 2 01' N], 19 watches to Kuxin man anchorage [Tiku, 0 23' S], 3 watches to Zhiqumian [Pariaman, 0 42' S], 3 watches to Jializai man [Padang, 0 57' S], 11 watches to Jiliman [Inderapura, 2 04' S], 14 watches to Foulu luo [Bengkulu, 3 47' S], 19 watches to Jiliman xu [Batu Ketjil island, 5 53' S, 104 27' E]], 5 watches to Fouluwu xu [Sebesi island in Sunda strait, 105 29' E], 3 watches to Foulu shang xiang [Sangian island, 105 50' E], 4 watches to the great mountain of Shigong [Gede mountain near Tandjung Sekong, 5 54' S, 105 59' E]], thence to Pan-jang [Pandjang island, 5 55' S] in Banten bay.

[The map contains no sailing directions for the west coast of Thailand and Burma with the Nicobar and Andeman islands. The 'Shun-feng' (f. 46) gives the stages for the journey from Kuala Pasai to Chittagong, and we attempt a provisional explanation. From Kuala Pasai, 12 watches to Qienanmao shan [Poulo Weh], 45 watches to the 'southern head mountain' of Andeman [Mount Mayo, 11 23' N, on Rutland island], 12 watches to Pingzhongjian [Saddle Hill,, 13 09' N, on North Andaman island], 50 watches to Chitu shan [South cliff, 21 20' N, on the coast of Burma], 5 watches to Rangliedang head [Patenga point, 22 13' N, associated with 'Juldia' hill], near Chadijiang [Chittagong].

[Huang Shengzeng (Xiyang chaogong dianlu, ch. 2, ff. 7-7v) records an interesting itinerary from Bengal to Male island, which we paraphrase and summarize. From Bengal the navigator descends to latitudes where the altitude of Polaris is, successively, 4.5 fingers, 3.5 fingers, 2 3/8 fingers, 2 1/8 fingers, 1 7/8 fingers, and 1 3/4 fingers; then he passes Yinggezui [Namunakuli in Ceylon] mountain; after 5 watches he sees Tiezhen island [Great Basses reef]; after another 7 watches he sees Fuoshzuo mountain [Dondra head]; after anohter 5 watches he sees the mountain of Yali [Galle]; whence he travels to Guanxu [Male island in the Maldives].]
